articles.author: Rishabh Raj
articles.title: 100:1 Stock Split: Rs 17000 share to become Rs 170 apiece after sub-division; check record date - ET Now
articles.description: 100:1 Stock Split: A nanocap stock trading above Rs 17,000 per share will undergo a 100:1 stock split. The current face value of Rs 1000 will be split into 100 shares, each with a face value of Rs 10. Check stock's name and record date of the stock split.
articles.content: 100:1 Stock Split: After the split, the stock's face value will reduce to Rs 10 from currently Rs 1000. (Image: Shutterstock/iStock/ET NOW News)
